product_overview: Celest AI is an AI-driven astrological Soul-Guide providing personalized, precise, real-time cosmic and psychological insights through advanced astronomical calculations and large language models, offering a modern mystical experience with therapeutic self-knowledge.
core_goals: Ensure astronomical calculation precision to the second using local libraries like kerykeion or swisseph.
Deliver deep psychological interpretations with empathy and personal context using GPT-4o-mini LLM.
Achieve technological sovereignty by performing backend astrology calculations to reduce dependence on costly external APIs.
Provide an immersive, premium user interface showcasing celestial aesthetics and interactive animations for a modern mystical user experience.
key_features: Cosmic Onboarding capturing birth date, time, and location to compute natal charts and generate astrological profiles.
AI Astrological Chat offering real-time, personalized guidance using natal charts and current transits with a caring, mystical persona.
Daily Dashboard summarizing key planetary transits and personalized 'Astral Climate' insights highlighting daily focus, challenges, and opportunities.
Trends & Alignment dashboard displaying personal and relationship (synastry) alignment trends based on user and partner data.
Synastry/Resonance relationship compatibility calculator analyzing conflict and harmony vectors between users.
Backend architecture utilizing Python, FastAPI, and precise astrology libraries integrated with GPT-4o-mini for rich interpretations.
Monetization via Stripe for subscription management unlocking premium features.
user_flow_summary: Onboarding: User submits birth details to trigger natal chart calculation and profile creation.
Chat: User interacts with AI chat; system uses cached natal chart and planetary transits to generate contextual prompts for GPT-4o-mini.
Insights: User accesses daily dashboard to review critical planetary transits and personalized astral climate.
Trends: User views daily and weekly alignment and partnership synergy on the Trends page.
Subscription: User completes Stripe payment to upgrade account status, updated in Supabase database.
validation_criteria: Astrological calculations verified for second-level precision against standard ephemerides.
LLM outputs are contextually relevant, empathetic, and strictly based on astrological data without hallucinations.
System performance ensures latency is masked by UI animations enhancing user experience.
Data integrity of user profiles and chat history maintained with Supabase consistency checks.
Payment workflows correctly update user premium status and subscription state in the system.
